
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Program6 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int age;
		Scanner sc=new Scanner((System.in));
		System.out.println(" enter age");
		age=sc.nextInt();
		if(age>=18)
			System.out.println(" eglible for voting");
		else
		System.out.println("not eglible for voting5");
		System.out.println("not eglible for vote");
		System.out.println("not at all eglible for vote");
System.out.println("not eglible for voting5");
		System.out.println("not eglible for vote");
		System.out.println("not at all eglible for vote");
		
		

	}

}
output:-
 enter age
5
not eglible for voting
